name: Playa Betty‚Äôs
address: 320 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA

reviews.text: Jordan was awesome!!!
Excellent happy hour, very friendly service, but if you're looking for tacos, there are better spots in the city.

Enjoyed the Taco Tuesday üåÆ lunch special today with Joha handling our large party table. She provided excellent service: patiently waited while our entire party arrived, checking on us frequently to make sure we received what we ordered and kindly let us split the check. I wholeheartedly recommend Playa Betty and if you‚Äôre lucky, you‚Äôll be seated in Josh‚Äôs section.
Anthi was AMAZING!! Great service and amazing food!! Would definitely recommend and will be back!
Tacos and drinks are amazing. Anthi was great!
Best guac, best tacos and best service! Anthi was amazing!
Always a great meal at Playa Betty‚Äôs. Our food came quickly and we didn‚Äôt feel rushed to get up. Our server Anthi was LOVELY and super attentive.
Best queso and service from Anthi!!!
We love to come at less once a week with the kids
We if a great time at Playa Betty‚Äôs last night. Our waitress was Aleyda. She was very attentive as were the people who assisted her when serving the dishes.

The food was very good. I had a steak burrito, Mexican street corn, and guacamole. They were all delicious. I had the cocktail ‚ÄúCool As Cucumber‚Äù and it was very good. Our server, Aleyda, was very attentive. The atmosphere was cool and beachy. The prices were fair and you got a lot of food. I would definitely recommend Playa Betty.
The service and food was great as always!
The chicken was dry. The Mexican street corn was terrible. I wasn't impressed with any of the food.
Great service
First time at Playa Betty's. Went for brunch and loved the atmosphere. The service was terrific.
Lucia was amazing, so helpful, kind and the food was delicious.
Genuinely had an amazing experience the food was great. Our server Lucia was attentive, friendly, and made the experience great.
Anthi is the best ever!! Great service and food! I love Playa Betty‚Äôs!

LOVE.THIS. PLACE. Where has the concept of pick your guacamole ‚Äúmix-ins‚Äù from a great assortment been all my life?? Fantastic food, very friendly service and an easy, roomy vibe‚Äînot packed in like sardines. Everything tastes super fresh and even though it was a very busy Sunday brunch, everything was exactly as ordered and promptly brought. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Great reasonably priced food in NYC - The frozen Paloma was awesome and can't recommend the enchiladas with shrimp and queso enough. Service was efficient, Jordan was a great fun server and provided some good recommendations. Would definitely come back here, patio wasn't too cold even in October :)

We had literally the best time. Our server Jordan was so friendly and helpful. We didn‚Äôt know what to order and he guided us through the best options with such a fun and informative attitude. And his suggestions were excellent. Highly recommend the Paloma! This man did not lie.

Came on a Thursday night and was promptly seated.  Had the best server. She didn‚Äôt rush and let us order double drinks to make it for happy hour.   The food is really good and the price point is perfect!
Matthew is the best server, he made our experience perfect! All the food and drinks were amazing!
Loved Maddi she was a gem!! Gladly going to come back to have HER as our server again
Nora is such a fabulous server! She was wonderful and made us smile :)
Delicious and Nora was the best server!

LOVED this place! Great spot for a quick bite before a show. My party of 3 had different entrees and we were all happy. I LOVED my bowl. And our server, Lucia, was absolutely fabulous -- friendly, warm, and helpful... a gem!
Okay good. Over priced. Super slow service if you sit outside
Lucia was fabulous!! Such a fun evening we will return!
Amazing server Lucia
We absolutely loved our experience with Nora!
Nara is the best server!
This is one of my favorite restaurants ever. Our waitress Nora was amazing‚Äîfriendly, attentive, and made sure we had everything we needed. Great service and a lovely attitude!
Jeanice was such a great bartender and friendly.

Bland food. Crazy to have to make my own guacamole. They literally gave me some mashed avocado and several ramekins of fixings to mix in (including pomegranate seeds?) but none of the magic that makes guac what it is -- we had to ask for lime but we just happen to know a homemade recipe. Beans were flavorless. "Lemony kale salad" looked like kale from a bag with a tablespoon of dressing from a bottle squirted on top. Disappointing
Joha was very attentive to our large group. She served us so efficiently and was very friendly. We were very happy that we chose Playa Betty for our group lunch. Thank you for all that you do!
Joha was an awesome server! The food was great and service was even better! Will come back soon.
Mexican Coke tacos FTW! üôå
Lucia was wonderful today as our server very freindly and attentive to our table and made us feel very comfortable she is the best.

Lucia was our server. Customer service was excellent!! This is the type of employee you should recognize and value. I hope she gets a raise or some form of incentive for her dedication. Great hire. Please consider different things to maximize the experience.
Her service was exemplary
Great experience! And Lucia, the server, was absolutely amazing!
Makin and Janice were amazing. Zoe ran the business like a true leader. Service starts from the top. Thank you Zoe and team!!! I will be back!!
Attentive waiters and solid food
Anthi was the BEST! She gave great recommendations, was friendly and talkative, and was top of our orders and attentive. Food and drinks were so good!

Let me tell you about Playa Betty‚Äôs- being someone from San Diego.. it‚Äôs the one place you can count on authentic Cali vibes. Anthi specifically was INCREDIBLE. She just brought the best energy and was so nice! I love this place!! (The spicy marg is also UNMATCHED)
Anthi was an amazing server, super friendly and helpful and made the best recs! We love playa betty‚Äôs!! The best neighborhood place and will always come back!!
Anthi was great!! Great value for the taco dinner
Great food, great vibes, and great service by Anthi
Tacos were great and Anthi was amazing!

Nice guacamole and burritos. Quite difficult to  catch your server's attention on peak times.

Í¥ÄÍ¥ëÍ∞ù 1ÎèÑÏóÜÎäî ÌòÑÏßÄÏù∏ ÎßõÏßë! ÏπòÌè¥Î†àÍ∞Ä Îß•ÎèÑÎÇ†ÎìúÎùºÎ©¥ Ïó¨Í∏¥ Ïù¥ÌÉúÏõê ÏàòÏ†úÎ≤ÑÍ±∞! Îã§ ÎßõÎÇ©ÎãàÎã§~!

6/28/25 finally had time to get here for happy hour(every day 3-6pm). Me and D sat outside, good people watching. Good service. The happy hour drinks are good and the food is good too. Love the $5 burger!  Guacamole is good and a big portion along with all the fixings for it.
Street corn was good too. We had several margaritas. We will be back.

Really solid tacos. I was a bit worried that the Taco Dinner would be too much food, but two tacos left me wanting a bit more. My friend also said that this is one of the few places that she can get real Austin-style queso.

The vibes is really nice, people are super friendly and food exquisite. I got 3 tacos mushrooms, al pastor and the best Birria. I was so full to have more food but I‚Äôll back to try more. This is the pelase that you never get tired of eat.

Fantastic food, atmosphere, and service that works for a family dinner or night out with friends.

We ate here after a long day at the Natural History museum.  With 3 hungry young boys and 1 tired baby we made our way through the front door.  Usually, our crew is met with a deep breath as the restaurant knows there is a 50/50 chance that our table will be rowdy, BUT not Playa Betty.  We were met with a huge "Hello and Welcome!" and every family member received a fist bump from one of the waiters.

Once seated, Craig greeted our table and informed us of happy hour, which I took part in.  He quickly came back to tell me that the keg was being changed so it would take a few more minutes but I didnt mind trying the other beer instead.  After receiving my beer, Craig returned with a sample of my original order now that the keg was changed, and he said, "I didn't want you to miss out on what you originally wanted!"

Craig was an incredible server, acknowledging all of the kids that ranged from 1.5 to 12 years old.  The whole restaurant catered to our kids and made them feel welcomed and appreciated.   Only one of my kids got a kids meal which came with an ice cream at the end.  Since this restaurant knows kid dynamics they voluntarily brought out ice cream for the other 3 free of charge.

The atmosphere was absolutely incredible and would work for any occasion from family dinner to night out with friends after work.  The food was out of this world good and the family could not get enough of the street corn.

I highly recommend this place and will absolutely be going back!
Definitely recommend such a cute and delicious restaurant. Our server Anika was sweet & accommodating. Street corn and tacos are a must!
Great atmosphere, lovely staff, drinks were great and plenty of options for dinner. Tried the tacos and quesadillas, tasty but slightly dry.

It took five minutes to be seated and another 8 minutes for the sever to come to the table. We arrived at 6:45P for the Happy Hour special. It was cutting it close to the cut off time but the hostess informed us we could still order before 7P. The server came at 6:58P for the order and put in burgers and Paloma‚Äôs. The burger was not like the picture in the other review. It was missing meat. It was burnt and it lacked any flavor or taste. It was very disappointing. The server never came to ask how it was. I asked another server for the manager and when no one came I decided to go to the hostess stand and mention that I won‚Äôt be ordering more food as I was left with a poor taste in my mouth from a burned burger. We were starving and wanted to order more food but we left and ate a neighboring restaurant. The staff wanted us to come back next time rather than handling the issue on this same visit. It was a very unpleasant experience. The picture I have doesn‚Äôt show the burnt meat but it does show that the cheese was burnt black. It was all lettuce and bread and very little meat. I think it does show that its size is small and it is like a mini slider with nothing but bread and lettuce.
tacoÂæàÂ•ΩÂêÉÔºåÊé®ËçêÁÉ§Áå™ËÇâÂíåÁÉ§ÁâõÊéíÁöÑÂè£Âë≥ÔºåÁÇ∏È±ºÁöÑÂè£Âë≥‰πü‰∏çÈîô„ÄÇ ÁéØÂ¢ÉÂæàÊúâÁâπËâ≤ÔºåÂÉèÊòØÂú®Êµ∑ËæπÁöÑÂ∞èÈ§êÈ¶Ü‰∏ÄÊ†∑„ÄÇ

The food was amazing! I got the birria tacos and they were great. Anthi was our server and she was awesome. Super sweet and helpful and reminded us it was happy hour! Yay for happy hour margs! We stopped by before a concert at the Beacon and the food came out quickly and was delish!

Had some downtime so i decided to sit at the bar for lunch. I came around 1pm where it was quiet not too many ppl. Menu is okayyy. I didnt feel it was alot of authentic Mexican choices but yea. I tried the Messy Betty!!!!!!!! Pork was lovely just kinda bland and it woulda went soo much better w bbq sauce. My bartender brought me buffalo sauce which did a lil something. But i enjoyed my meal w my Passion Mint Lemonade.
The bartender was very kind and just gave off great energy, as well as the manager on duty. Thank u guys

Umm AMAZING!!!! Best food ever. Experience was so fabulous. The vibes are immaculate. How have I not known this was here??? Camryn is the best!! Soo sweet, personable, clean, organized and talented. We are looking forward to making this a weekly if not more experience. The frozen Paloma was sensational, the tacos and breakfast tacos were next level. Decor is so cute-giving a ‚ÄúChuy‚Äôs‚Äù vibe like Southwest Texas meets Nashville, although it‚Äôs marketed as California style..the vibe is just chill, food is A+ and service is top notch. Please give Camryn a raise, she is a STAR and made our first day off in weeks SO worth it! Leaving so happy and can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Went during happy hour and taco tuesday! the food and decor were so great ! The atmosphere was kinda cray with glasses being dropped / shattered and a woman falling off her seat and hitting her head üò¢ hope she‚Äôs okay but just a little too loud for me

My cousin Service Matthew was so amazing that I‚Äôm coming back Zoe. The manager was amazing the Barton his drink was amazing. That‚Äôs all I could say I am a CRITIC  and they got 100.PERCENT I‚Äôm very particular on  drinks and this bartender on a Wednesday night SCORED HIGH!!!!!

Been wanting to try this place for a while. Came for a late lunch early dinner. We came during happy hour which is 3-6 m-f. Drinks were like $5 off, not bad. I loved the frozen Paloma this was so good. The margarita was good too and strong. There were a lot of items on the menu that looked delicious but we only ordered enchiladas and the fish tacos. The green sauce on the enchiladas made it for us, but next time I don‚Äôt think we‚Äôll order them. The bean and rice side was not it, though. Very bland and no flavor at all. However, the fish tacos were amazing. I‚Äôm definitely coming back for the tacos and to try other items on the menu. Overall a good place just don‚Äôt get the beans and rice.
We love love love Matthew! He was speedy and very knowledgeable about the menu. I will be back!
I love Playa Betty‚Äôs Taco Tuesdays. The food is amazing and the servers provide such great service! Their Flan is my favorite dessert.

Thank you to Joha for jumping right in to take care of our unscheduled large group for lunch!!
She made sure we all had what we needed in a timely fashion and handled the discreet ordering to allow the hosts to order and pay without issue.
Have been many times before!! It never fails!!!

Playa Betty‚Äôs is a wonderful Mexican restaurant and a great place to eat if you‚Äôre going to The Beacon Theater or Lincoln Center. While we tried to make last minute reservations at other restaurants, because of the size of Playa Betty‚Äôs dining area, they had lots of reservations available and yet when we ate there, the restaurant was filled with guests. The food was delicious and reasonably priced and most importantly, healthy! We had a salad and one of their bowls but the best was the  Churro Ice Cream Sandwich!

Came here for the happy hour and had a great time! Queso and chips were good, drinks were excellent, and our server Anthi was really on top of it and very friendly and helpful. A great place for a reasonable happy hour, good food, and great service!

I felt like I was right off the beach at an amazing place to eat, drink, and have fun!  Our server, Craig, could not have been any better. He was not only amazing with us, but I was able to watch as he and the rest of the Playa Betty team worked so efficiently, and happily I might add.
This place has been hopping since we got here at around 7 PM. We just missed happy hour which includes a five dollar Betty burger and so many other marvelous treats.
We did take advantage of taco Tuesday and boy was in a treat!  I have also got to say that I have had thousands of salads in my life and the Sunset chopped salad that I ate here was phenomenal!  So many flavors and textures, it was divine.
Can't wait to come back again.
Sincerely,
Melissa Caruso, RN and Kenneth Wemm, MD

Don't go if you are hungry. The burritos suck. Had barely any chicken.  20 dollars for filler. Rice and beans were crispy and bland??

Yes the place looks hoppin but its insanely loud and service is slow as heck. Id gladly go to Chipotle for a burrito over this place. Many other Mexican food spots in the area. Skip this one.

The food was decent. The best things they have are the frozen drinks and the customizable bowl. The comedy show also is a cool atmosphere. The service was outstanding! My waitress Lucia was attentive, positive, and she made our experience very enjoyable.

This place has many things to offer. Located at a corner of busy intersection in upper west side, very spacious with plenty of seating options including a central bar and patio. Massive windows that can be opened where you can people watch while enjoying your bite and drink.
RESERVATION recommended. Friendly staff with excellent service.
The theme is west coast, everything inside bring the beach vibes of California. Suitable for a hot summer day.
I went there for the comedy club located in the basement of the restaurant where I grabbed a bite before the show.

I've always had a soft spot for Playa Betty's ‚Äì it's practically an institution on the Upper West Side. Every time I return, I'm pleasantly surprised by their ability to keep things fresh and exciting on the menu. Their latest addition, the brunch menu, is no exception. It's a true smorgasbord with options catering to all tastes, and each dish is a delightful fusion of beachy flavors.

For the health-conscious, the breakfast burrito bowl stands out as a nutritious yet satisfying choice. On the flip side, the French toast is a sinful indulgence that is worth every bite. One thing not to miss is their customizable guacamole; where they bring you a tray full of goodies to allow you to tailor the guac to your exact preferences.

Stepping into Playa Betty's for brunch feels like a mini getaway to the sunny shores of California. Highlights include their inventive twist on chicken and waffles with the fried chicken and churros, a refreshing cactus mimosa, and, of course, their stellar taco selection.

If you're in search of a great brunch spot on the Upper West Side that ticks all the boxes ‚Äì relaxed atmosphere, reasonable prices, and generous portions ‚Äì look no further than Playa Betty's.

Didn‚Äôt eat but I love the space, drinks, and service so I‚Äôm sure the food is awesome! One of a few places open on Xmas day, what a colorful and welcoming space.  Our bartender Naomi is a doll and serves up a great Pink Peppercorn Paloma and Sangria!!
Great crowd and all the food items were excellent. We went for brunch and even though it was busy, we got a table and Nicole delivered fas friendly service. A wonderful outing and delicious food.

There are many places that I like to go and enjoy meal, but this place offers more than just enjoyment. It offers comfortable environment. It offers delicious food. It offers hospitality. Everyone is very nice. I have not seen any negativity that I would want to give. I will highly recommend this place to everyone.

Had a great lunch here on a weekday afternoon. Huge place so getting a table wasn‚Äôt an issue. Lots of vegetarian options. Guacamole and chips were great. We got it with the salsa trio and they were fresh and full of flavor. Probably the best I‚Äôve had for such a simple and standard starter. For the mains, the avocado taco was a great sounding option but was surprisingly lacking in flavor. Next time I‚Äôll get the salsa trio with it for the missing flavor. The vegan enchilada was really good, although would have loved for the fresh veggies to have been roasted more with some char.

Overall, knowing this was Baja/Cali Mex, had expected milder flavors than the usual spicy Tex Mex but be aware to avoid disappointment if you‚Äôre expecting a lot of heat.

Great meal and would certainly return.

We‚Äôve been wanting to try Playa Betty‚Äôs for a while and wow did it exceed our expectations. The happy hour is incredible and brunch is amazing! the food is fresh, tastes good, and comes out quickly. The best part of our brunch was our server, Souleymane. He was patient, kind, and had a great vibe about him. i would definitely recommend a trip here for any meal. the service and food will NOT disappoint!

There are bunch of outside seats and decorations looks fine from the outside. Food was horrible. Guac was just too salty not fresh at all. Rice and beans were so dry. Carnitas was so lean. Burrito was just average. I don‚Äôt understand people rate this place for 4-5 stars‚Ä¶.

Pretty nice spot. The ambiance is nice and the space is accommodating for large groups but it‚Äôs weird the kitchen offers a different menu to the basement. Great waitress though and some great offerings. The wings weren‚Äôt as good as the photos but the avocado and queso dip were great. The tacos though are where it‚Äôs at. üåÆ üòé nice place and the comedy club downstairs is great. Errors with QR codes and submitting payments though.

Visited the other day with a friend post dance class and it was truly the perfect experience! Our server Mathew was super helpful and definitely made the experience! He recommended the cauliflower bites - and they are to die for!! Will definitely be back soon.

Truly a wonderful experience at Playa Betty‚Äôs. I was pleasantly impressed by our server, Zoe. She was attentive,  friendly and a wealth of knowledge with both the menu and wine pairings. She made our evening extra special while we celebrated my mom‚Äôs 75th birthday. If you haven‚Äôt been to Playa Betty‚Äôs‚Äîyou must go, and ask for Zoe.

Very much California vibes. I definitely felt like I was in there having a very tasty taco. The guacamole and chips is very tasty and a huge portion. I liked the fact that they sent the guacamole with all the ingredients in the side, so you can get to choose what you want and the amount. The tacos we ordered were very good and tasty. The drinks were nice, but the frozen volcano one I got I couldn‚Äôt finish drinking it. It‚Äôs was super sweet and I couldn‚Äôt enjoy it. I drank not even half. But the other drink was good. But I wasn‚Äôt lucky ü•≤
Love Playa Betty‚Äôs! Drinks, food, and vibes are all 10/10. Mathew was our server and I‚Äôm obsessed! So charismatic and sweet, very attentive, and gave great recommendations!

The description and pics of the food in their menu did not match what the restaurant served us, especially the dessert. We bought a pitcher of margarita that was mostly ice and very sour/tart. Better Mexican fare could be enjoyed elsewhere.

My mom and I stumbled in here randomly on a beautiful day on the UWS - Lance was our bartender. He recommended the frozen Paloma which was OUT OF THIS WORLD. We each had a shrimp and fish taco. 10/10!
Fantastic brunch @ Playa Betty's. Got a table outside right away and great menu, with lots of options. Loved the pork belly, crispy Brussels sprouts and cheese dip. Will be back!

VERY Mid, food was mediocre-not seasoned at all except the fries (those were really good), service was really good as well the food was just weak. The floors were oddly slippery as well, not too sure what that was about. It was also really loud (music) with nothing good playing. Wasnt really my vibe.
